author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
https://dbrand.com/switch2
Sign up to get notified when dbrand’s Switch 2 Killswitch case drops.

Nintendo finally ANNOUNCED the Switch 2, and even though it might SEEMthey were light on details, there is a TON of Info - both in the video itself and rumors that have been MOSTLY confirmed. New Joycons: Check. SPECS: check. Will this beat the PS5 and Xbox? Probably, with all-time great franchises like Mario, Zelda and Smash leading the way. We break down everything we know and friends, we can’t wait till the April 2 Direct.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1597036-i-hate-nintendo-and-i%E2%80%99m-buying-a-switch-2-immediately/

title: I Hate Nintendo and I’m Buying a Switch 2 IMMEDIATELY
